Get Started â†’

5 minutes

Is all you need to have an ECS Service / Cluster running inside your existing Terraform setup.

Fargate

Airship modules support both Fargate AND EC2 as ECS Cluster

Fully-integrated into AWS

ECS Services can be tailored to have minimal rights to other AWS components.

ALB & NLB Support

Hook your services directly on a Network or Application Load Balancer

Auto-scaling

Scale your cluster or services with a simple codeblock

Drift support

Deploy your ECS Services with CI/CD and still make changes to your ECS Task Definition

Authentication

Built-In Cognito support makes it possible to add authentication to your services

S3 Access

If your services needs access to S3, a simple directive makes it happen

CronJobs

There is a Simple directive to have tasks periodically

SSM / KMS

Give your ECS Service access to secured parameters with two lines of code
